page.title: 20Hunting with the Staghounds
page.content: A days{hunting}starts early,{horses have breakfast of oats and bran-mash, given a final groom and plaited up. Correct{hunting dress}is sensible smart and protective. The hard hat saves the riders head in a fall, leather boots protect the legs, the stock, a length of material wound round the neck affords neck protection and in an accident can be used to bind a wound. {Riders}assemble at the{Meet,}then follow behind the{Master, Huntsmen}and four to five couple of best trusted hounds called Tufters to where the {Harbourer }has selected a huntable deer. This has to be singled out from the others so that hounds can settle to its scent.{After hunting,}horses are settled, tack is checked for damage, cleaned and polished.
